alert.note: Alert for Central Washington; Interior Hancock; Southern Penobscot (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 08 at 6:04AM EST until February 08 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Mixed rain and snow expected. Total snow accumulations of less than 1 inch. Ice accumulation a trace. * WHERE...Southern Penobscot, interior Hancock, and central Washington Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST this morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Icy spots are expected on untreated roads and walkways as temperatures will be near freezing. Slushy travel is expected on lesser traveled roads that were snow covered prior to today.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.

area.areaDesc: Central Washington; Interior Hancock; Southern Penobscot
